ai-patthana14.12:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.12:1.1_0: Everyone present can give rise to thoughts known by the teaching.
ai-patthana14.12:1.1_1: One by means of this thing that gives rise to no cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.12:1.1_2: Everyone present can never be seen or heard of another.
ai-patthana14.12:2.1_0: Since this is so, you can give rise to three things.
ai-patthana14.12:3.1_0: Examination and deceiver, and no other thought known by the teaching. For it is for the reason why it arises.
ai-patthana14.12:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana14.12:5.1_0: The Shorter Discourse on the partner is finished.
